Real Name: Bruce Wayne
Special Powers
TARGETING: Hindering
HOW MUCH DO YOU WEIGH?: Wing movement symbol. // When Batman carries, carried characters have Batman team ability until your next turn.
BACK INTO THE SHADOWS: Super Senses, Willpower.
SHADOWS OF CRIME ALLEY: Smoke Cloud, Precision Strike. // FREE: If Batman occupies hindering terrain, place him in a square of hindering terrain within 4 squares and line of fire.

Comments
January 14, 2023
tidge
The quasi-random nature of HeroClix pulls play a long, cruel game. This was one of my pulled Legacy Cards, but I never actually pulled the original common figure it goes with; the one I have I had to trade for (a long time ago). This was a good choice for a Legacy Card, as it was the 2012 stats which drove the hyper-sized point cost. This figure is channeling the feels of how it was to play a 2008 AA099 "Lamppost" Batman with feats. Go ahead and add the no-cost s001 Utility Belt.
January 10, 2023
thugit
The original was one of the most definitive Batman dials ever, and now they markedly improved it and made it half the cost. His 60 point dial is what people will use the most, but this is the “star of the show” Batman.
